sourcesContent:
import { Task } from "../../Models/Task"; import "./SingleTask.css"; export function SingleTask(props:Task): JSX.Element { var myTable =`
ID ${props.id}
Name ${props.name}
Responsible ${props.responsible}
Scheduled For ${props.scheduledDate}
Completed? ${props.isCompleted}
`; return (
{myTable}
); }
